verbs.description: While [V: speaking] [ARG2: to the National Space Council] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARG0: President Trump] called on the Defense Department to take steps toward creating a space force , a new branch of the United States military focused on space .

[ARGM-TMP: While speaking to the National Space Council on Monday] [ARG0: President Trump] [V: called] [ARG1: on the Defense Department] [ARG2: to take steps toward creating a space force , a new branch of the United States military focused on space] .

While speaking to the National Space Council on Monday President Trump called on [ARG0: the Defense Department] to [V: take] [ARG1: steps toward creating a space force , a new branch of the United States military focused on space] .

While speaking to the National Space Council on Monday President Trump called on the Defense Department to take steps toward [V: creating] [ARG1: a space force , a new branch of the United States military focused on space] .
